name: Riding Chained Horse
description:
There are lot of Horse racing and horse jumping shows held around the globe. People Love to watch the Horses Running on the Tracks. Jockeys try to beat each other. Every step and every jump is counted to win the final race.

There are two horses in each level. One horse that is controlled pro-grammatically in the game and 2nd horse will be in player’s horse which is controld by player. AI horse will run on the Racing track while a chain is attached to the player's horse. Jockey’s Main task is to reach the finish line without breaking the chain. The chain breaks before crossing the finishing line, you will be out the track , and you loss the game.so,play and show your horse riding skill.

Riding Chained Horse: Features

Realistic 3D Horse Racing Track
Exciting Races And Challenges
Awesome 3D Graphics And 3D Sound Effects
Beautiful 3D Animated Horses
